title: Could be a better download......
body:
Ok so im in the beta thing dowloading, but didn't realise the space i had to have... so then it said failed to write to disk. Now i have to RE-download it. and i have a limited connection so i just wasted 1gb just to redownload it, which i can'tt now

Can someone that has downloaded it uploaded the files to mediafire and send me a link so i can download it??

replies.body:
Downloading the client from another cloud service will not help reduce your network usage. If you want to re-download the client, click [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download).

{{champion:17}}
At least you are not downloading legacy client again. Also we cannot distribute the client through any cloud storage as that breaches the TOS of the Alpha testing.
